WorkItem.Description:
Hi!

I was under the impression that NTLEA should allow us to bypass the Japanese display language check performed by certain games. However, it doesn't seem to work for this one: 

http://mana.product.co.jp/yumearu/

http://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=729526

Any idea what the issue might be?

Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: ゆめいろアルエット！ still requires Japanese display language to run with NTLEA
